Posted By: KrosanGardener (8/6/2009 6:38:51 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
He's... Just bad guys. 5 mana in black... let's see what that can buy us real quick as an alternative...  
[Cairn Wanderer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cairn Wanderer) for a dredge deck would be a million times better than this cat.  
If you're looking for a Legendary to be your general, [Chainer, Dementia Master](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chainer, Dementia Master) will pull anything big out fo your graveyard for only 3 mana and 3 life and also give it a bonus. He's a stud.  
[Chimney Imp](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chimney Imp) Possibly one of the greatest cards ever.  
[Consume the Meek](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Consume the Meek)Clear the field so your 4 cost you dropped the turn before can get in.  
[Crypt Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Crypt Angel) Is just straight up better, sure, it's only a 3/3, but it has recursion built in and pro white. The only things that get rid of it at that point are red spells, so unless your opponent is playing red and has burn left in his hand turn 5, you've got card advantage and field advantage.  
[Demigod of Revenge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Demigod of Revenge) Makes this card just look BAD.  
[De](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=De)... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

Posted By: supershawn (3/7/2011 9:18:57 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
It's always interesting to see old cards that make Flying such a huge advantage.   
  
What i mean is that before, flying used to do things like this. Either it will make you sacrifice a creature, or lose some life, and if it doesn't have these effects, then it's Power/Toughness isn't equal to it's CMC (EG [Runeclaw Bear](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Runeclaw Bear) has an equal P/T -> CMC)  
  
Thank god for R & D for changing this... and maybe screwing up again. Now with cards like [Storm Crow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Storm Crow), i don't think the game will EVER be fair again.
posts.html:

Thank god for R & D for changing this... and maybe screwing up again. Now with cards like Storm Crow, i don't think the game will EVER be fair again.
